short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple todo list Chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Simple ToDo List extension. 

Users can launch the extension in browser and add items as to-do list. They can mark the items completed, pending. Users can filters the items. Users can remove any items either not completed or completed. 

Users do not have to use any login or provide any personal information. The extension is available for free. Download and use in the browser. If you clear the browser cache, you lose all the saved to-do list items.

I use browser storage to store these items. It can persist in browser session as long as you do not clear cache.
